item.description:
On Wednesday, June 30th, my friends, Anna and Bill (Receita de Samba), will be performing, singing a jazzy Samba at the West End Johnnies (http://www.westendjoh..., 138 Portland Street, Boston ( a block from North Station). They will start playing 8pm (until 11pm).

In my opinion, they are the best Samba group in town.
I know that I have a strong bias since I am talking about my friends, however judge for yourself.

If you have not heard Receita de Samba before, here is a link to their page and take a listen to a few of their songs:

www.myspace.com/receitadesamba

The cover charge is only $10.

There is also a bonus, also included will be a Samba dance lesson from 7 to 8pm.

I plan to arrive at 8pm and therefore I will miss the dance lesson.
However, I encourage people to take the dance lesson and then join me and the group at 8pm at a reserved table.




Joana

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Samba Night
